item.description:
It's that time of the year again!

3/5/2011 8:00 PM

The Sons of Italy
120 Quarry St
Quincy, MA 02169



Hello Everyone,

It's that time of the year again...Don't miss the event of the year!!

*The Annual Food Drive Party*

featuring: "THE WORLD PREMIER BAND"

Tickets $20
Hot & Cold Buffet  Coffee & dessert
(Proper Dress)

With over 400 people attending last year at(Club58),it is always a great night of entertainment for a good cause,with one of the best dance bands around!We have moved the party to a new venue(due to handicap access issues)and with a capacity of 300 at "The Sons of Italy".....I would suggest to arrive early(Doors open at 7:30pm). Please rsvp: This event will sellout! Call me at 781-963-2691

Directions: www.quincysoi.com

Check out the band @www.worldpremierband.com

Please bring non-perishable food items for the (St Joseph's food pantry) 550 Washington St Quincy, ma
item.why: it's a great night out to and help those in need!
item.name: Let's get together and dance the night away!!!
